The claim linked President Barack Obama: s failure to "push job creation" to the economic issues and tensions in Ferguson.
The claim was fact: checked using data from the U.S. Census Bureau's American Community Survey, which showed that the black unemployment rate in Ferguson was 1.9 times higher than the white unemployment rate during the period of 2010-2012, and 2.8 times higher when including data from 2008-2012.
